title: Account may be hacked.
body:
So twice now after my games have been completed i have been kicked from the client because someone had logged onto my account, ive changed my password twice now ( after each incident). Is it possible to find out which computer my account was logged into and put restrictions on that users client or something. Im worried that im going to lose my account to this if i dont log on enough to make sure its all in check. Or atleat have a rioter contact me about this. I havent seen anything wrong with the account nor games played that i haven't so this could also be so random thing but its never happened before so yeah any help is greatly appreciated.
Thanks!

replies.body: If you ever think your account might be hacked or compromised, your best bet is to hit up our account team through our [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). They'll be able to go over all your personal information with you there to get your account back in your hands.
i would try to send a ticket for support, and do the troubleshooting for it
